ticket.title: Publish > Select all ambiguities
ticket.original-body:
This is my problem:
I wanted to publish all stores, but not publish all resources. When I clicked on the Stores link in the Publish menu, I could Publish 100 stores at a time, but I wasn't sure if I clicked on "Select all" next to the Publish button if it would publish all resources (Tech Tour, Setting, and so on) or just all the Stores (what I wanted). I wasn't sure, so what I did is publish 100 stores at a time, 11 times.
I think we need an easy way to Publish all the resources that you are looking at. I recommend:
* Changing the text "Select all" => "Select all {resource type}" so... something like "Select all Stores", and only publish the stores.
One more small point on this... the pagination layout is a little strange. Please fix it too :-)
